name: Ignis III
description:
Diane Drubay

Ignis III, Still from video, Utopia series, 2021

In the Utopia series, Diane Drubay plays with colour-psychology to create an immersion that is both fascinating and shattering. She takes the viewer into an idealized vision of a world where interference colours cover the sky, creating a subjugating sense of calm. In this piece, seconds become years. Gradually this mesmerizing world is being transformed into a darker, but equally fascinating vision. 14 seconds to experience the metamorphosis of utopia into dystopia. 14 years to reach carbon neutrality or the point of no return.

Diane Drubay is a visual artist working with photography and digital media to create visions of alternative realities. She nudges for more Nature awareness and positive change for better futures.
